languages.text: "Твари, которые осуществляют первичное заражение — разведчики ксеносской расы тиранидов. Создав генокульт, они... "эволюционируют" в нечто более сложное, зовущееся Патриархом. Разум Выводка генокульта становится психическим маяком для тиранидов, помечающим уязвимую планету. Когда флот ксеносов оказывается возле зараженного мира, это становится сигналом к восстанию. Генокульт бьет защитникам в спину, а ксеносы пожирают все живое на планете. И поверьте, "праведники" генокульта не получают обещанного вознесения. Они становятся биоресурсом... едой".

"The creatures that infect the first victims act as scouts for a xenos race known as Tyranids. After creating a Genestealer Cult, the scout... 'evolves' into something more complex, an entity called the Patriarch. The collective mind of the Brood becomes a psychic beacon for the Tyranids, a beacon that marks the planet as vulnerable. Once the xenos fleet approaches the infected world, the rebellion begins. The cult strikes the world's defenders in the back while the xenos devour all life on the planet. And the cult's true believers certainly do not find the ascension they were promised. Instead, they all become a bioresource. Food."
languages.original_text: "Твари, которые осуществляют первичное заражение — разведчики ксеносской расы тиранидов. Создав генокульт, они... languages.text: “最初遭到感染的生物，会成为泰伦虫族的侦察兵。当他们的侦察兵创建基因窃取者教团之后，他们会……‘进化’成某种更加复杂的东西，成为某种被称为‘族长’的生物。对泰伦虫族而言，虫群的集体思想会成为他们思想的信标，代表着他们所在行星已经遭到了渗透。一旦泰伦虫族的舰队接近被感染的行星时，叛乱就会爆发。那些邪教徒会在背后搞破坏，瓦解行星的守护力量，而来袭的异形则会吞噬行星上所有的生命。至于那些邪教信徒，他们自然无法得到承诺过的擢升。恰恰相反，所有邪教徒都会沦为虫群的生物资源——也就是食物。”
languages.original_text: "The creatures that infect the first victims act as scouts for a xenos race known as Tyranids. After creating a Genestealer Cult, the scout... 'evolves' into something more complex, an entity called the Patriarch. The collective mind of the Brood becomes a psychic beacon for the Tyranids, a beacon that marks the planet as vulnerable. Once the xenos fleet approaches the infected world, the rebellion begins. The cult strikes the world's defenders in the back while the xenos devour all life on the planet. And the cult's true believers certainly do not find the ascension they were promised. Instead, they all become a bioresource. Food."

languages.text: «Las criaturas que infectan a las primeras víctimas sirven como exploradores para la raza xenos conocida como tiránidos. Una vez fundado un culto Genestealer, el explorador... "evoluciona" a una forma más compleja, una entidad denominada patriarca. La mente colectiva de la progenie se convierte entonces en una suerte de baliza psíquica para los tiránidos, una señal que marca el planeta como un lugar vulnerable. Cuando la flota xenos se halla próxima al mundo infectado, comienza la rebelión. El culto se subleva contra los defensores del planeta en la retaguardia mientras los xenos devoran todas las formas de vida de la superficie. Huelga decir que los devotos del culto no reciben la apoteosis prometida, sino que acaban convertidos en un recurso biológico. En comida».
languages.original_text: "The creatures that infect the first victims act as scouts for a xenos race known as Tyranids. After creating a Genestealer Cult, the scout... 'evolves' into something more complex, an entity called the Patriarch. The collective mind of the Brood becomes a psychic beacon for the Tyranids, a beacon that marks the planet as vulnerable. Once the xenos fleet approaches the infected world, the rebellion begins. The cult strikes the world's defenders in the back while the xenos devour all life on the planet. And the cult's true believers certainly do not find the ascension they were promised. Instead, they all become a bioresource. Food."

languages.text: 「最初の感染者を出したクリーチャーは、ティラニッドとして知られている、異種族の斥候です。ジーンスティーラー・カルトを作った後、スカウトはより複雑なもの、パトリアークと呼ばれる存在へと 『進化』します。個体群の集合精神はティラニッドにとって超能力の信号となり、惑星が脆弱であることを示す信号となる。異種族の艦隊が感染した世界に近づくと、反乱が始まります。異種族が惑星上のすべての生命を食い尽くす間、カルト教団は世界の防衛者を背後から攻撃をします。そしてカルトの真の信者たちは、約束されたアセンションを見つけることはできなかった。代わりに、彼らはすべて生物資源となった。つまり、食料です」
languages.original_text: "The creatures that infect the first victims act as scouts for a xenos race known as Tyranids. After creating a Genestealer Cult, the scout... 'evolves' into something more complex, an entity called the Patriarch. The collective mind of the Brood becomes a psychic beacon for the Tyranids, a beacon that marks the planet as vulnerable. Once the xenos fleet approaches the infected world, the rebellion begins. The cult strikes the world's defenders in the back while the xenos devour all life on the planet. And the cult's true believers certainly do not find the ascension they were promised. Instead, they all become a bioresource. Food."

languages.text: "Die Kreaturen, die die ersten Opfer infizieren, agieren als Späher für ein Volk der Xenos, die als Tyraniden bekannt sind. Nach der Schaffung eines Symbiontenkultes 'entwickelt' sich der Späher ... in etwas Komplexeres, eine Wesenheit, die 'Patriarch' genannt wird. Der kollektive Verstand der Rotte wird damit zu einem psychischen Sender für die Tyraniden, der den Planeten als verwundbar markiert. Sobald sich die Flotte der Xenos der infizierten Welt nähert, beginnt die Rebellion. Während der Kult den Verteidigern der Welt in den Rücken fällt, verschlingen die Xenos das gesamte Leben auf dem Planeten. Und die wahren Gläubigen des Kultes erfahren gewiss nicht den Aufstieg, der ihnen versprochen wurde. Stattdessen enden sie allesamt als Bioressource. Nahrung."
languages.original_text: "The creatures that infect the first victims act as scouts for a xenos race known as Tyranids. After creating a Genestealer Cult, the scout... 'evolves' into something more complex, an entity called the Patriarch. The collective mind of the Brood becomes a psychic beacon for the Tyranids, a beacon that marks the planet as vulnerable. And the cult's true believers certainly do not find the ascension they were promised. Instead, they all become a bioresource. Food."

Der kollektive Verstand der Rotte wird damit zu einem psychischen Sender für die Tyraniden, der den Planeten als verwundbar markiert. Und die wahren Gläubigen des Kultes erfahren gewiss nicht den Aufstieg, der ihnen versprochen wurde. Stattdessen enden sie allesamt als Bioressource. Nahrung."

languages.text: « Les créatures qui infectent les premières victimes font office d'éclaireurs pour une race de xénos répondant au nom de Tyranides. Une fois le culte Genestealer créé, son fondateur... "évolue" pour donner naissance à quelque chose de plus complexe, une entité surnommée le patriarche. La conscience collective du couvain devient alors une sorte de balise psychique pour les Tyranides, un fanal qui désigne telle ou telle planète comme une cible vulnérable. La rébellion commence lorsque la flotte xénos arrive à proximité du monde infecté. La secte implantée à sa surface poignarde ses défenseurs dans le dos pendant que les xénos se chargent de dévorer toute forme de vie. Quant aux vrais fidèles du culte, ils peuvent faire une croix sur l'ascension qui leur a été promise. Au lieu de cela, ils sont tous réduits à l'état de bioressource... De nourriture, en somme. »
languages.original_text: "The creatures that infect the first victims act as scouts for a xenos race known as Tyranids. After creating a Genestealer Cult, the scout... 'evolves' into something more complex, an entity called the Patriarch. The collective mind of the Brood becomes a psychic beacon for the Tyranids, a beacon that marks the planet as vulnerable. Once the xenos fleet approaches the infected world, the rebellion begins. The cult strikes the world's defenders in the back while the xenos devour all life on the planet. And the cult's true believers certainly do not find the ascension they were promised. Instead, they all become a bioresource. Food."

languages.text: "İlk kurbanları genleriyle zehirleyen yaratıklar, Tiranit adındaki bir zeno ırkı için keşif eri olarak hizmet eder. Gençalan Tarikatı'nı kurduktan sonra bu keşif eri... Daha karmaşık bir şeye, Reis olarak bilinen bir varlığa 'evrilir'. Sürü'nün müşterek zihni, Tiranitler için bir ruhsezi fenerine dönüşür. Bu fener ki gezegenleri saldırıya açık olarak işaretleyebilir. Zeno filosu, enfekte olan dünyaya yaklaştığında da isyan başlar. Tarikat, dünyayı savunanları gafil avlarken zenolar da dünyadaki tüm yaşamı yok ederler. Tarikatın gerçek inananları ise kendilerine vadedilen yükselişe asla erişemez. Bunun yerine hepsi biyokaynağa, yani gıdaya dönüşür."
languages.original_text: "The creatures that infect the first victims act as scouts for a xenos race known as Tyranids. After creating a Genestealer Cult, the scout...
